1.name: Algebraic total of the quantity values in line items in a message

2.name: Number of line items in message

3.name: Number of line and sub items in message

4.name: Number of invoice lines
4.desc: Number of lines on an invoice.

5.name: Number of Customs item detail lines
5.desc: Total number of occurrences of the Customs item detail section within a single Customs declaration message.

6.name: Number of Customs entries
6.desc: Number of entries which are subject to the same Customs procedures, and have the same tariff or statistical heading, country and duty regime.

7.name: Total gross weight
7.desc: Code to indicate total gross weight of a consignment.

9.name: Total number of ULD (Unit Load Device)
9.desc: The total number of Unit Load Devices mentioned in the message.

11.name: Total number of packages
11.desc: [7370] Total number of packages of the entire consignment.

12.name: Invoice total amount
12.desc: [5444] Total sum charged in respect of one or more Invoices in accordance with the terms of delivery.

13.name: Number of loading lists
13.desc: [1166] Number of loading lists, manifests or other similar specifications attached to a document.

14.name: Number of Customs commercial detail lines
14.desc: Commercial detail section within a single Customs declaration message.

16.name: Total number of equipment
16.desc: Total number of equipment mentioned in the message.

17.name: Declared total Customs value
17.desc: [5070] Total value declared for Customs purposes of all goods in a consignment, whether or not they are subject to the same Customs procedure, or have the same tariff/statistical heading, country information, and duty regime.

18.name: Total reported quantity in net weight
18.desc: Total reported quantity in net weight.

19.name: Total reported quantity in supplementary units
19.desc: Total reported quantity in supplementary units.

20.name: Total reported invoice(s) value
20.desc: Hash total of the total monetary amounts reported on the invoices.

21.name: Total reported ancillary costs
21.desc: Hash total of the reported total extra costs (e.g. carriage, freight, insurance) of all invoices.

23.name: Total ordered quantity
23.desc: Total quantity ordered in this message.

24.name: Number of orders referenced in this message
24.desc: Total number of order messages or documents referenced in this message.

25.name: Number of rejected order lines
25.desc: Total number of rejected order lines in this message.

26.name: Total gross measurement/cube
26.desc: Total gross cubic measurement of the goods, including packing but excluding transport equipment.

27.name: Total number of credit items given for control purposes
27.desc: Total number of credit items given for control purposes.

28.name: Total number of debit items given for control purposes
28.desc: Total number of debit items given for control purposes.

29.name: Total net weight of consignment
29.desc: A code to indicate the total net weight of a consignment.
